title: Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", ca. 1936
medium: Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: cafetiere (underlined); lower right: acier inoxydable [stainless steel]
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Flaring cylindrical coffeepot drawn in plan and elevation decorated around the lower center with two applied bands, the rounded lid with applied curved thumbpiece and a scroll handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Coffeepot", ca. 1936.
ca. 1936. Pen and black ink on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-53.
